modName: The Joy of Perspective - Compatibility Patch ARMORIZER
summary: Simple download to properly switch the first person models to third person model meshes. This mod is made to be used with 'The Joy of Perspective' Mod.
descriptionHtml:
Simple download to properly switch the first person models to third person model meshes. This mod is made to be used with 'The Joy of Perspective' Mod.

It is handled by replacing the 1st person meshes with the third

This took me only a few minutes but, I figured others would also enjoy a quick and easy download. Whether they are unaware of how to go about the conversion or if they're simply lazy (Like I wanted to be, but there was no compatibility patch)
author: All Credit goes to the creators of the armors and the person heading ARMORIZER
